0.text: Bug 124570  Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session.

1.text: I am testing BIRT 2.0 RC2 and am running into a problem where Preview (from the toolbar) in the Web Viewer will only show the first report I opened in a session.

3.text: Start BIRT 2.0 RC2, create a project and import the attached two designs into the project.

5.text: Open Product Catalog and then click on the Preview button on the toolbar to see the report.

6.text: Once you have viewed the report, close the viewer.

8.text: Open Sales Invoice and click on the Preview button again.

9.text: Actual Result: You see the Product Catalog report again.

10.text: Expected Result: You should see the Sales Invoice report.
